short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record, replay and analyze web app behavior. Collect and export data for trouble tickets. Capture screenshots and videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
webQsee is privacy-centric. Data you capture with webQsee is stored LOCALLY per default and does NOT leave your system without your prior knowledge. 

üöÄ FREE USER FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ no account / registration required
‚Ä¢ sniff and analyze website communication (network + console)
‚Ä¢ make screenshots and videos (resolution up to 4K)
‚Ä¢ unlimited amount of screenshots and videos
‚Ä¢ capture and replay later: tab video + sniffed communication
‚Ä¢ capture and view later: tab screenshot + sniffed communication
‚Ä¢ edit and annotate screenshots
‚Ä¢ manage thousands of screenshots and videos using the Gallery
‚Ä¢ save environmental data for all Gallery items
‚Ä¢ group, sort and filter sniffed data
‚Ä¢ store sniffed data in the cloud (optional) + share with anyone
‚Ä¢ export as HAR, XLSX and more, optionally using filter criterias
‚Ä¢ ... and much more!

üòç CUSTOMER ONLY FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ longer max video duration
‚Ä¢ better import capabilities
‚Ä¢ classify sniffed communication using custom rules
‚Ä¢ share custom rules with your team
‚Ä¢ share Cloud Gallery items with your team
‚Ä¢ ... or share them with Jira, Slack and Microsoft Teams

For a more detailed list of features, visit webqsee.com
